* Updates the body of a method declaration. This method is called by the
	 * {@link ChangeSignatureProcessor} and allows implementors to refactor the body
	 * of the given method declaration.
	 *
	 * @param methodDeclaration
	 * @param cuRewrite
	 * @param result
	 * @throws CoreException
* Returns whether {@link ChangeSignatureProcessor} should check if * deleted parameters are currently used in the method body. * * @return true by default, subclasses can override
